WINDOWS_INSTALLER.TITLE: Windows installer generator
WINDOWS_INSTALLER.DESC: Specify a name to identify the VPN connection to be generated.

GEN.TEXT: An error occurred while generating the installer

GENERATING.TEXT: The installer for the selected OpenVPN configuration is being generated, please wait

SUCCESS_GEN.TEXT: The installer has been created successfully

ERRORS.READING_FILE: The documentation file '{{ name }}' could not be loaded

USE_SAMPLE.TITLE: Usage examples:
USE_SAMPLE.TIP: You can add multiple filter patterns separated by spaces:

FILEUPLOAD_PANEL.UPLOAD_PLACEHOLDER: Drag and drop a file here

INFO.LOADING_TEXT: The file is being uploaded to the server to be processed, please wait

CHECKING_UPDATES.TEXT: Please wait while we check for available updates

NEW_VERSION.TEXT: There are available updates for the applications shown below.
NEW_VERSION.SUBTEXT: Do you want to proceed with the update?
NEW_VERSION.SUBTEXT_PKG_INSTALL: To update these applications use the package system of the Linux distribution in which you have installed your FWCloud console..

MANUAL_VERSION.TEXT: You can select manually which applications you want to update:

VERSION_ALREADY_UPDATED.TEXT: The latest available version of the system is currently installed

APPLYING_UPDATES.TEXT: Please wait until all updates have been applied, you will receive a message when the process is complete.
APPLYING_UPDATES.SERVER_CONNECTION_LOST: Waiting for the server to apply updates

RELOAD_REQUIRED.TEXT: Applied updates require the application to be reloaded. When you close the dialog you will be redirected to the login screen.

NEW_VERSION.SUBTEXT: You can try later from the Help menu.

APPLYING_UPDATES.TEXT: An error occurred during the update, please try again later and if the problem persists, contact technical support

CHECKING_CHANGELOG.TEXT: Couldn't get CHANGELOG.md file of {{ appName }} application.

ERRORS.READ_DATA: An error occurred while getting the information of {{ name }}

TIMEOUT.TEXT: The operation could not be completed as the maximum waiting time of the server has been exceeded

NO_INST_DATA.TEXT: The firewall has no management IP defined, you can add one from the edit panel

IMPORT.SELECT_OPTION: Choose the way you want to import the rules.

OPTIONS.COPY_PASTE: Paste the output of the iptables-save command
OPTIONS.SSH: Connect to the firewall through SSH or FWCloud-Agent

ERRORS.ERROR: There was an error importing the rules

TXT_WARNING.TITLE: Important
TXT_WARNING.TEXT: Please review the policy to verify that it is correct.

EXPORT.TEXT: Enter the access credentials of the firewall to run the iptables-save command.

INFO.CLIPBOARD: The rules have been copied to the clipboard

ERRORS.ERROR: There was an error exporting the rules

DHCP_RULE_PANEL.TITLE: New DHCP rule
DHCP_RULE_PANEL.FROM: From (drag and drop a valid object)

NO_RULES_TO_COMPILE.TEXT: There are no DHCP configuration rules for this firewall/cluster.

NO_DHCP_GROUPS.TEXT: In order to create a DHCP rule, there must be at least one rule group in the firewall

GET_DHCP_GROUPS.TEXT: Failed to read the information from the firewall DHCP groups

ERRORS.INVALID_FROM: This object type is not allowed in the DHCP rules
ERRORS.SAVE_RULE: An error occurred saving the rule

COMMUNICATION_INSTALL_ERROR.TEXT: It is not possible to install the DHCP configuration file because the communication mechanism with the destination firewall is different from FWCloud-Agent.
COMMUNICATION_INSTALL_ERROR.CLUSTER_TEXT: It is not possible to install the DHCP configuration file because the communication mechanism with all the nodes of the destination cluster of firewalls is different from FWCloud-Agent.

KEEPALIVED_RULE_PANEL.TITLE: New Keepalived rule
KEEPALIVED_RULE_PANEL.FROM: From (drag and drop a valid object)

NO_RULES_TO_COMPILE.TEXT: There are no Keepalived configuration rules for this firewall/cluster.

NO_KEEPALIVED_GROUPS.TEXT: In order to create a Keepalived rule, there must be at least one rule group in the firewall

GET_KEEPALIVED_GROUPS.TEXT: Failed to read the information from the firewall Keepalived groups

ERRORS.INVALID_FROM: This object type is not allowed in the Keepalived rules
ERRORS.SAVE_RULE: An error occurred saving the rule

HAPROXY_RULE_PANEL.TITLE: New HAProxy rule
HAPROXY_RULE_PANEL.FROM: From (drag and drop a valid object)

NO_RULES_TO_COMPILE.TEXT: There are no HAProxy configuration rules for this cluster or firewall.

NO_HAPROXY_GROUPS.TEXT: In order to create a HAProxy rule, there must be at least one rule group in the firewall

GET_HAPROXY_GROUPS.TEXT: Failed to read the information from the firewall HAProxy groups

ERRORS.INVALID_FROM: This object type is not allowed in the HAProxy rules
ERRORS.SAVE_RULE: An error occurred saving the rule

ROUTING_RULE_PANEL.TITLE: New routing rule
ROUTING_RULE_PANEL.FROM: From (drag and drop a valid object)

NO_ROUTING_TABLES.TEXT: In order to create a routing rule, there must be at least one route table in the firewall

GET_ROUTING_TABLES.TEXT: Failed to read the information from the firewall routing tables

ERRORS.INVALID_FROM: This object type is not allowed in the routing rules
ERRORS.SAVE_RULE: An error occurred saving the rule

ERRORS.SAVE_ROUTE: An error occurred saving the table route
ERRORS.INVALID_GATEWAY: This object type is not allowed as a route gateway

GETTING_INFO.TEXT: An error occurred while trying to read OpenVPN configuration data.
